frontmatter.title: Tether a High Speed Transfer Server to Aspera on Cloud

internal.content:
--- title: Tether a High Speed Transfer Server to Aspera on Cloud hiddenFromSearch: true --- ### This is a test for mark in the infomdx file. You will be able to see multiple things in this video - How to locate the install media on passport advantage (with product codes) - How to load the ICP installation images into Docker - How to configure the ICP hosts file - How to add the clusters SSH key to the ICP deployment package NOTE: These tasks must be completed before you install ICP for a successful deployment. --- --- [IBM Knowledge Center](https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/search/aspera%20high%20speed%20transfer%20server) [Aspera Downloads Site](https://downloads.asperasoft.com) [![MCM](../../../images/SWAT_Header.gif)](http://localhost:8000/) ------- test with image in directory [![MCM](./SWAT_Header.gif)](http://MCMSWAT.com) export default ({children}) =>
{children}
